price: Mbega yemwe! Abo hambere, boba basigiye abo mu nyuma zabo iragi ryo guhakana Intumwa muri ubwo buryo nyene! Ahubwo rero mbere, bo ni abantu biganza bakagarariza, bagahuza umutima w’ubugarariji n’akagagazo, gutyo bagasusa no mu buryo bwo kugarariza.
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
